import React, { useState } from 'react' import{ Box,} from '@mui/materials' import './LoginSignup.css' import user_icon from '../assets/person.png' import email_icon from '../assets/email.png' import password_icon from '../assets/password.png' import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import Chatabot from '../chatbot/Chatabot' import { useRegisterUserMutation } from '../../services/languageapi' const LoginSignup = () => { const [action, setAction] = useState("Login"); const navigate=useNavigate(); const [registerUser, {isloading}]=useRegisterUserMutation() const handleSubmit = async(e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); const data=new FormData(e.currentTarget); const actualData={ name: data.get('name'), email:data.get('email'), password: data.get('password'), tc: data.get('tc'), } const res=await registerUser(actualData) if(res.error){ setServerError(res.error.data.errors) } if (res.data){ } } return ( <>
{action}
{action === "Login" ?
:
}
{action === "Sign Up" ?
:
Lost Password? Click Here!
}
{ setAction("Sign Up") }}> Sign Up
{ setAction("Login") }}>Login
 ) } export default LoginSignup
